dcterms:description: The BraTS18 database contains a total of 285 patients with MRI scans, including T1-weighted, T1-contrast enhanced, T2-weighted, and T2 Fluid Attenuated Inversion Recovery MRI. The segmentation labels categorize each pixel into one of four classes: enhancing tumor, peritumoral edema, necrotic and non-enhancing tumor core, and background.
dcterms:title: BraTS18
